lead_paragraph: Upon further review, Lawyer Ron’s record winning time in the Whitney Handicap at Saratoga will stand. Lawyer Ron won Saturday’s one-and-an-eighth-mile Whitney in 1 minute 46.64 seconds, but the accuracy of the clocking was questioned by The Daily Racing Form. Hand timings verified the teletimer results, and yesterday the race was re-timed off the video.
